20101215192114.000|20101215192116.000|CCO|INITIAL RESULTS OF OUR CIVIL 
20101215192116.000|20101215192118.000|CCO|INVESTIGATION.
20101215192118.000|20101215192120.000|CCO|NOW, THIS INVESTIGATION BEGAN 
20101215192120.000|20101215192122.000|CCO|SHORTLY AFTER APRIL 20th OF THIS
20101215192122.000|20101215192124.000|CCO|YEAR WHEN AN EXPLOSION AND FIRE 
20101215192124.000|20101215192125.667|CCO|DESTROYED THE DEEPWATER HORIZON 
20101215192125.667|20101215192127.333|CCO|OFFSHORE DRILLING RIG THAT WAS 
20101215192127.333|20101215192129.000|CCO|LOCATED THE GULF OF MEXICO 
20101215192129.000|20101215192130.667|CCO|APPROXIMATELY 50 MILES FROM THE 
20101215192130.667|20101215192132.333|CCO|MISSISSIPPI RIVER DELTA.
20101215192132.333|20101215192134.000|CCO|THIS INCIDENT CLAIMED THE LIVES 
20101215192134.000|20101215192136.500|CCO|OF 11 RIG WORKERS, AND IT MARKED
20101215192136.500|20101215192139.000|CCO|THE START OF A MASSIVE OIL SPILL
20101215192139.000|20101215192141.500|CCO|THAT WOULD TAKE MORE THAN THREE 
20101215192141.500|20101215192144.000|CCO|MONTHS TO CONTAIN.
20101215192144.000|20101215192146.000|CCO|IT'S SET OFF A CHAIN REACTION OF
20101215192146.000|20101215192148.000|CCO|DEVASTATING CONSEQUENCES FOR THE
20101215192148.000|20101215192150.000|CCO|PEOPLE, FOR THE ENVIRONMENT, AND
20101215192150.000|20101215192152.000|CCO|FOR THE ECONOMY OF THE GULF 
20101215192152.000|20101215192154.000|CCO|COAST, A REGION STILL STRUGGLING
20101215192154.000|20101215192156.000|CCO|TO RECOVER FROM HURRICANES 
20101215192156.000|20101215192158.000|CCO|KATRINA AND RITA.
20101215192158.000|20101215192200.000|CCO|THE DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE 
20101215192200.000|20101215192202.000|CCO|LAUNCHED BOTH CRIMINAL AND CIVIL
20101215192202.000|20101215192204.000|CCO|PROBES INTO THIS MATTER.
20101215192204.000|20101215192206.500|CCO|WE DISPATCHED DOZENS OF TOP 
20101215192206.500|20101215192209.000|CCO|ATTORNEYS TO THE GULF REGION AND
20101215192209.000|20101215192211.500|CCO|MEMBERS HAVE MADE MULTIPLE TRIPS

20101215192214.000|20101215192216.000|CCO|FOR MONTHS LAWYERS AND 
20101215192216.000|20101215192218.000|CCO|INVESTIGATORS HAVE BEEN WORKING 
20101215192218.000|20101215192220.000|CCO|NIGHT AND DAY AND IN CLOSE 
20101215192220.000|20101215192222.000|CCO|COORDINATION WITH THE LOCAL U.S.

20101215192227.750|20101215192229.000|CCO|AS A RESULT, THE UNITED STATES 
20101215192229.000|20101215192230.250|CCO|HAS FILED A CIVIL LAWSUIT IN

20101215192312.333|20101215192314.000|CCO|SAFETY AND OPERATIONAL 
20101215192314.000|20101215192316.500|CCO|REGULATIONS INCLUDING FAILURE TO
20101215192316.500|20101215192319.000|CCO|TAKE THE NECESSARY PRECAUTIONS 
20101215192319.000|20101215192321.500|CCO|TO SECURE THE WELL PRIOR TO THE 
20101215192321.500|20101215192324.000|CCO|APRIL 20th EXPLOSION.
20101215192324.000|20101215192326.500|CCO|FAILURE TO UTILIZE THE SAFEST 
20101215192326.500|20101215192329.000|CCO|DRILLING TECHNOLOGY TO MONITOR 
20101215192329.000|20101215192331.500|CCO|THE WELL'S CONDITION, FAILURE TO
20101215192331.500|20101215192334.000|CCO|MAINTAIN CONTINUOUS SURVEILLANCE
20101215192334.000|20101215192335.667|CCO|OF THE WELL, AND FAILURE TO 
20101215192335.667|20101215192337.333|CCO|UTILIZE AND TO MAINTAIN 
20101215192337.333|20101215192339.000|CCO|EQUIPMENT AND MATERIALS THAT 
20101215192339.000|20101215192340.667|CCO|WERE AVAILABLE AND NECESSARY TO 
20101215192340.667|20101215192342.333|CCO|ENSURE THE SAFETY AND PROTECTION
20101215192342.333|20101215192344.000|CCO|OF PERSONNEL, PROPERTY, NATURAL 
20101215192344.000|20101215192345.667|CCO|RESOURCES, AS WELL AS THE 
20101215192345.667|20101215192347.333|CCO|ENVIRONMENT.
20101215192347.333|20101215192349.000|CCO|NOW, WE INTEND TO PROVE THAT 
20101215192349.000|20101215192350.667|CCO|THESE VIOLATIONS CAUSED OR 
20101215192350.667|20101215192352.333|CCO|CONTRIBUTED TO THE MASSIVE OIL 
20101215192352.333|20101215192354.000|CCO|SPILL AND THAT THE DEFENDANTS 
20101215192354.000|20101215192356.000|CCO|ARE THEREFORE RESPONSIBLE UNDER 
20101215192356.000|20101215192358.000|CCO|THE OIL POLLUTIONING AT.
20101215192358.000|20101215192400.000|CCO|FOR GOVERNMENT REMOVAL LOSSES, 
20101215192400.000|20101215192402.000|CCO|ECONOMIC LOSSES, AS WELL AS 
20101215192402.000|20101215192404.000|CCO|ENVIRONMENTAL DAMAGES.
20101215192404.000|20101215192406.000|CCO|WE'RE ALSO SEEKING CIVIL 
20101215192406.000|20101215192408.000|CCO|PENALTIES UNDER THE CLEAN WATER 
20101215192408.000|20101215192410.000|CCO|ACT WHICH PROHIBITS THE 
20101215192410.000|20101215192412.000|CCO|UNAUTHORIZED USE OF OIL IN THE 
20101215192412.000|20101215192414.000|CCO|WATERS.
20101215192414.000|20101215192416.000|CCO|WE ALLEGE THAT THE DEFENDANTS 
20101215192416.000|20101215192418.000|CCO|NAMED IN THIS LAWSUIT WERE IN 
20101215192418.000|20101215192420.000|CCO|VIOLATION OF THE ACTS THROUGH

20101215192422.000|20101215192424.000|CCO|GUSHING INTO THE GULF OF MEXICO 
20101215192424.000|20101215192425.429|CCO|AND WE INTEND TO HOLD THEM FULLY

20101215192426.857|20101215192428.286|CCO|OF THE LAW.
20101215192428.286|20101215192429.714|CCO|OVER THE PAST YEAR I MYSELF HAVE
